thread.title: Global equities poised for another week of turmoil after weak Chinese data
thread.title_full: Global equities poised for another week of turmoil after weak Chinese data

author: Tara Cunningham
title: Global equities poised for another week of turmoil after weak Chinese data
text: Markets Global equities poised for another week of turmoil after weak Chinese data Weak manufacturing data from China pushed global equities back into the red. The FTSE 100 tumbled more than 2pc in early trade - wiping Â£36bn off the index in one hour. Experts believe investors are taking money out of UK stock markets amid uncertainty over the political landscape after the general election Photo: AFP By Tara Cunningham , Business Reporter 9:22AM BST 01 Sep 2015
